Danish Domicile
丹麦宫殿

mcVancient recreates Frederiksborg Castle
mcVancient还原了腓特烈堡

 


Builder mcVancient spent up to 50 hours building this 1:1 replica of Frederiksborg Castle. The real castle, located in Denmark, was built as a royal residence for King Christian IV in the early 17th century and currently houses the Danish Museum of National History. Not only is mcVancient's work stunning from the outside – the interior includes all 128 rooms! If only we could find the bathroom...
建造者mcVancient 耗时多达50小时来以1:1的比例还原腓特烈堡。这座现实存在的城堡位于丹麦，是在17世纪早期为国王克里斯蒂安四世建造的皇宫，现在成为了丹麦国家历史博物馆。mcVancient的作品不仅在金玉其外，而且隽永其中——室内完整地涵盖了128个房间！在这么大的地方我们得好好找找厕所在哪…

replies.author: LocusAzzurro
replies.txt_content: bathroom其实也是厕所的意思 和意思更贴切

replies.txt_content:
